name: HTMLrev
title: htmlrev.com
shortDescription: HTMLrev offers a vast collection of over 1500 free HTML website templates suitable for various needs such as blogs, ecommerce sites, and admin dashboards. It caters to developers and designers looking for quick and customizable web solutions. An example use case is a startup needing a landing page without the overhead of designing from scratch.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: BootstrapMade
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers similar free and premium templates

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: ThemeWagon
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides a wide range of HTML templates

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Colorlib
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Features free and premium HTML templates
